articles.author: Siladitya Ray
articles.title: Walmart Is The Latest Major Company To Roll Back DEI Policies Amid Conservative Backlash - Forbes
articles.description: Conservative pundit and prominent anti-DEI activist Robby Starbuck took credit for the changes, claiming this was the biggest win for his movement to “end wokeness in corporate America.”
articles.content: Walmart will roll back some of its diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives, becoming the latest major company to pull back on inclusivity efforts amid pressure from conservative activists.Walmart… [+1652 chars]

articles.author: GEOFF HARRIS | The National News Desk
articles.title: Vaping impacts blood vessels & oxygen, new study says - KOMO News
articles.description: According to new research presented at the Radiological Society of North America, vaping has an immediate effect on how a person's blood vessels work.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (TNND) Nicotine or not, a new study is looking into how vaping affects your health. According to new research presented at the annual meeting of the Radiological Society of North America, … [+1843 chars]
